mapper.sql: SELECT BNO, TITLE, B_CONTENT, B_REG_DATE, U_DATE, B_UNO, LIKE_COUNT, VIEW_COUNT , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CMT WHERE C_BNO = BOARD.BNO AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM DEL_CMT WHERE CNO = DEL_CMT.CNO) ) AS CMT_COUNT FROM BOARD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BNO, B_UNO, TITLE, B_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, ${b_uno}, #{title}, #{b_content})
mapper.select:
-- WHERE BNO NOT IN (SELECT BNO FROM DELETED_BOARD) 이 구문 유무에 따라 속도차이 엄청 심하다. 왜지? WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT BNO FROM DELETED_BOARD WHERE BNO = BOARD.BNO)
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR B_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND B_UNO = (SELECT UNO FROM USERINFO WHERE NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
AND B_UNO = ${uno}
ORDER BY BNO DESC
ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC, BNO DESC
WHERE B_UNO = ${uno} ORDER BY BNO DESC
SELECT U.NICKNAME AS WRITER FROM BOARD B, USERINFO U WHERE B.B_UNO = U.UNO AND BNO = ${bno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LIKE_HISTORY(BNO, UNO, LIKE_DATE) VALUES(#{bno}, #{uno}, SYSDATE)
